languages.text: "Я... привычен к боли. В отличие от тебя, {name}". {n}Во взгляде друкари сквозит интерес.{/n} "Я бы взглянул, как ты... перенесешь подобное. Но не сейчас. В другой раз".
"I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."
languages.original_text: "Я... привычен к боли. В отличие от тебя, {name}". {n}Во взгляде друкари сквозит интерес.{/n} "Я бы взглянул, как ты... перенесешь подобное. Но не сейчас. В другой раз".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我……已经习惯了痛苦，与你不同，{name}。”{n}你看到玛拉斋的目光中闪过一丝兴趣。{/n}“我希望看到你……品尝这样的痛苦。不过这次就算了，下次再说吧。”
languages.original_text: "I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."

traits.locale_text: “我……已经习惯了痛苦，与你不同，{name}。”{n}你看到玛拉斋的目光中闪过一丝兴趣。{/n}“我希望看到你……品尝这样的痛苦。不过这次就算了，下次再说吧。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は…痛みに慣れているのさ。お前と違ってな、{name}」{n}デュカーリの目は好奇心で光る。{/n}「見たいんだ…お前がこの手の装置に耐える姿を。だが今じゃない。また今度、だ」
languages.original_text: "I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は…痛みに慣れているのさ。お前と違ってな、{name}」{n}デュカーリの目は好奇心で光る。{/n}「見たいんだ…お前がこの手の装置に耐える姿を。だが今じゃない。また今度、だ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Estoy... acostumbrado al dolor. A diferencia de ti, {name}». {n}Percibes un atisbo de interés en la mirada del drukhari.{/n} «Me gustaría verte... {mf|sometido|sometida} a algo como esto. Pero ahora no. En otra ocasión».
languages.original_text: "I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy... acostumbrado al dolor. A diferencia de ti, {name}». {n}Percibes un atisbo de interés en la mirada del drukhari.{/n} «Me gustaría verte... {mf|sometido|sometida} a algo como esto. Pero ahora no. En otra ocasión».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis... habitué à la douleur. Contrairement à vous, {name}. » {n}Vous décelez une lueur d'intérêt dans le regard du Drukhari.{/n} « Je serais curieux de vous voir endurer de tels tourments, mais ce sera pour une autre fois. »
languages.original_text: "I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis... habitué à la douleur. Contrairement à vous, {name}. » {n}Vous décelez une lueur d'intérêt dans le regard du Drukhari.{/n} « Je serais curieux de vous voir endurer de tels tourments, mais ce sera pour une autre fois. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... bin den Schmerz gewöhnt. Im Gegensatz zu Euch, {name}." {n}Du erkennst im Blick des Drukhari einen Hauch von Interesse.{/n} "Ich würde gerne erleben, wie Ihr ... damit zurechtkommt. Aber nicht jetzt. Ein andermal."
languages.original_text: "I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... bin den Schmerz gewöhnt. Im Gegensatz zu Euch, {name}." {n}Du erkennst im Blick des Drukhari einen Hauch von Interesse.{/n} "Ich würde gerne erleben, wie Ihr ... damit zurechtkommt. Aber nicht jetzt. Ein andermal."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ben... Senin aksine acıya aşinayım {name}." {n}Drukhari'nin bakışlarında belli belirsiz bir ilgi fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Böyle bir şeye... Katlanışını görmek isterim. Ancak şimdi değil. Başka bir zaman..."
languages.original_text: "I... am accustomed to pain. Unlike you, {name}." {n}You detect a glimmer of interest in the Drukhari's gaze.{/n} "I would like to see you... endure something like this. But not now. Another time."
